channel.title: Emily Chang - eHub
channel.description: A daily resource for new web/mobile services and applications

item.title: Artsy Editor
item.dc:creator: Emily Chang
item.description: Artsy Editor is an advanced full-screen WordPress WYSIWYG editor. It provides faster, less-hassle ways to format, add links, upload media and scale images, so you can focus on writing the best content. Fits perfectly with bloggers and WordPress developers. URL: Artsy Editor
item.content:encoded: Artsy Editor is an advanced full-screen WordPress WYSIWYG editor. It provides faster, less-hassle ways to format, add links, upload media and scale images, so you can focus on writing the best content. Fits perfectly with bloggers and WordPress developers. URL: Artsy Editor

item.title: WikiCards
item.dc:creator: Cesar H Castro Jr
item.description: A free tool that helps users organize any kind of collections. A collection can be a set of contacts, documents, tasks, hour records, software bugs, todos, photos, recipes and many others. URL: WikiCards
item.content:encoded: A free tool that helps users organize any kind of collections. A collection can be a set of contacts, documents, tasks, hour records, software bugs, todos, photos, recipes and many others. URL: WikiCards

item.title: Frank
item.dc:creator: Cesar H Castro Jr
item.description: A freelancers management service, that helps both employers and freelancers. Employers can sort freelancers by skills, see who’s available and book in seconds with just a few clicks. Freelancers can broadcast availability and skill sets. URL: Frank
item.content:encoded: A freelancers management service, that helps both employers and freelancers. Employers can sort freelancers by skills, see who’s available and book in seconds with just a few clicks. Freelancers can broadcast availability and skill sets. URL: Frank

item.title: My Code Stock
item.dc:creator: Cesar H Castro Jr
item.description: A free online service for storing and managing code snippets and complete Scripts in any Coding Language (e.g. PHP, JavaScript, SQL, BASIC). URL: My Code Stock
item.content:encoded: A free online service for storing and managing code snippets and complete Scripts in any Coding Language (e.g. PHP, JavaScript, SQL, BASIC). URL: My Code Stock

item.title: Student Coupons
item.dc:creator: Cesar H Castro Jr
item.description: Whether it’s buying take-out, booze, groceries, clothing or a frozen yogurt, the Student Coupons pledge to users is to offer exclusive deals that don’t suck. In return for these super-duper deals, businesses expect Student Coupons to get the word out and make the connection between the students and retailers. URL: Student Coupons
item.content:encoded: Whether it’s buying take-out, booze, groceries, clothing or a frozen yogurt, the Student Coupons pledge to users is to offer exclusive deals that don’t suck. In return for these super-duper deals, businesses expect Student Coupons to get the word out and make the connection between the students and retailers. URL: Student Coupons

item.title: Pzyche
item.dc:creator: Cesar H Castro Jr
item.description: A conversion optimization engine that understands who your visitors are and what products they are looking for. Allowing websites to greet visitors with real-time content and promotions that are relevant to them. URL: Pzyche
item.content:encoded: A conversion optimization engine that understands who your visitors are and what products they are looking for. Allowing websites to greet visitors with real-time content and promotions that are relevant to them. URL: Pzyche

item.title: Shall I Buy
item.dc:creator: Cesar H Castro Jr
item.description: Get instant shopping advice with this mobile application which allows users to share their purchase intentions and get instant feedback from friends.. URL: Shall I Buy
item.content:encoded: Get instant shopping advice with this mobile application which allows users to share their purchase intentions and get instant feedback from friends.. URL: Shall I Buy

item.title: iTrulyCare
item.dc:creator: Cesar H Castro Jr
item.description: It’s the easiest way to promote events like running a marathon, volunteering, hosting a pottery class, a cause or passion and then connect with like minded people. URL: iTrulyCare
item.content:encoded: It’s the easiest way to promote events like running a marathon, volunteering, hosting a pottery class, a cause or passion and then connect with like minded people. URL: iTrulyCare

item.title: Webplanner
item.dc:creator: Cesar H Castro Jr
item.description: An online collaborative project management tool that uses the power of the cloud to brainstorm project goals, phases, tasks, and multiple levels of subtasks within teams. URL: Webplanner
item.content:encoded: An online collaborative project management tool that uses the power of the cloud to brainstorm project goals, phases, tasks, and multiple levels of subtasks within teams. URL: Webplanner

item.title: LiquidSpace
item.dc:creator: Emily Chang
item.description: Find a great space to work now. Use the LiquidSpace iPhone app to find the space you need, when you need it, wherever you are. You can book space in high-end business centers, hip startup co-working spaces, or hotel conference rooms. You can even unlock private spaces for meetings at offices that have space to […]
item.content:encoded: Find a great space to work now. Use the LiquidSpace iPhone app to find the space you need, when you need it, wherever you are. You can book space in high-end business centers, hip startup co-working spaces, or hotel conference rooms. You can even unlock private spaces for meetings at offices that have space to share. URL: LiquidSpace
